content.body:
Is the change in https://github.com/mdn/content/pull/13229/files correct?
Specifically, does `handler.defineProperty()` intercept `Object.prototype.__defineGetter__` and `Object.prototype.__defineSetter__`?
content.formatted_body:
Is the change in https://github.com/mdn/content/pull/13229/files correct?
Specifically, does handler.defineProperty() intercept Object.prototype.__defineGetter__ and Object.prototype.__defineSetter__?

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body:
Is the change in https://github.com/mdn/content/pull/13229/files correct?
Specifically, does `handler.defineProperty()` intercept `Object.prototype.__defineGetter__` and `Object.prototype.__defineSetter__`?

Is the change in https://github.com/mdn/content/pull/13229/files correct?
Specifically, does handler.defineProperty() intercept Object.prototype.__defineGetter__ and Object.prototype.__defineSetter__?

content.body: Barring exceptions, `__defineGetter__` and `__defineSetter__` invoke `DefinePropertyOrThrow`, which invokes `[[DefineOwnProperty]]`, which in a proxy is handled by the `defineProperty` method, so I'd say yes.
content.formatted_body: Barring exceptions, __defineGetter__ and __defineSetter__ invoke DefinePropertyOrThrow, which invokes [[DefineOwnProperty]], which in a proxy is handled by the defineProperty method, so I'd say yes.

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: Barring exceptions, `__defineGetter__` and `__defineSetter__` invoke `DefinePropertyOrThrow`, which invokes `[[DefineOwnProperty]]`, which in a proxy is handled by the `defineProperty` method, so I'd say yes.
Barring exceptions, __defineGetter__ and __defineSetter__ invoke DefinePropertyOrThrow, which invokes [[DefineOwnProperty]], which in a proxy is handled by the defineProperty method, so I'd say yes.
